title.rendered: Official Central University of Technology Prospectus 2024 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The Central University of Technology Prospectus consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Central University of Technology admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Central University of Technology based on the information provided within it.

Note: Central University of Technology’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

Central University of Technology Prospectus 2024

The Central University of Technology   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.cut.ac.za/.

Central University of Technology PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD

See also Official Durban University of Technology Handbook 2024 – Download Now
